title: Mr Europe and the common market
creator_credit: William K McClure, Carousel Films and Columbia Broadcasting System
brief_description: Summarises the economic changes in Western Europe today. Shows the costly difficulties encountered by a truckload of goods from Manchester, England, before it arrives at its destination in Italy. Shows how the common market breaks down barriers, and benefits participating countries. Interviews Jean Monnet, “Mr Europe” and other businessmen involved in the common market.
